name: Companions for Brakey´s Game Jam 2021.1
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

!ATTENTION!

Please use the Web GL fullscreen button to play the game.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is our humble entry for the Brackey´s Game Jam 2021.1.

In this game you play as a Test Subject that tries to escape from a lab.

Although this is a short game, we tried our best.

We hope you like it.

The Developers.

Credits to 

xRoDrInUx for :

Game Development, Menu, Programmation ...

Eduardo Teuchman for :

Music soundtrack of the game

Santiago Garcia for:

Game Development, Programmation ...
